snippet: A Milwaukee man knew what he was doing when he accused his teenage neighbor of burglary and shot the boy to death, jurors decided Friday.
abstract: Wisconsin jurors decide John Henry Spooner was sane when he accused 13-year-old Darius Simmons of burglary and shot him to death in 2012; verdict essentially guarantees that Spooner, age 76, will die behind bars; jury decided two days earlier that Spooner was guilty of first-degree homicide.
lead_paragraph: A Milwaukee man knew what he was doing when he accused his teenage neighbor of burglary and shot the boy to death, jurors decided Friday.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Teenager’s Killer, 76, Was Sane, Jury Rules
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Teenager’s Killer, 76, Was Sane, Jury Rules
